title: Ashley Benson displays her lithe physique as she poses in lingerie in sultry bathroom selfie
text:
She's a successful actress best known for her roles in Pretty Little Liars and Her Smell.

And Ashley Benson set pulses racing as she shared a series of sultry snaps wearing a dark red bra and matching bottoms.

The actress, 29, displayed her lithe physique in the photo as she posed in front of a bathroom mirror.

Stunning: Ashley Benson, 29, set pulses racing as she shared a series of sultry snaps wearing a dark red bra and matching bottoms

Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Ashley captioned the snap: 'Love this little number and you @sweetbabyjamie @thekitundergarments'.

Some celebrities commented on the post including Rita Ora who wrote: 'Yaaaas' while Georgia May Jagger said: 'This body!!!'

Ashley, who began her modelling career at the tender age of eight, is in a relationship with British supermodel Cara Delevingne.

Cara and Ashley were reported to have secretly married at the Little Vegas Chapel in Las Vegas.

Radiant: The actress displayed her lithe physique in the photo as she posed in front of a bathroom mirror

A report from The Sun stated that the celebrity couple wed at the Little Las Vegas Chapel in front of famous friends including Sophie Turner, the Jonas brothers and Charlize Theron.

'They were sure about what they are doing and they were sure about what they mean to each other,' the chapel's Michael Kelly told the publication.

'They were clearly devoted to each other and they had the biggest smiles on their faces. You could see that they were serious about what they were doing but having the most fun. They wanted it simple, quiet and easy.'

Romance: Ashley, who began her modelling career at the tender age of eight, is in a relationship with British supermodel Cara Delevingne (pictured in September 2019)

Nuptials: Cara and Ashley were reported to have secretly married at the Little Vegas Chapel in Las Vegas (pictured in February 2019)

Cara indirectly referred to Ashley while accepting the Hero Award at the TrevorLIVE Gala in New York City this past June.

'I also have another very special woman in this room to thank and you know who you are,' she said.

'She’s one of the people who help me love myself when I needed it most and I really needed it. She showed me what real love is and how to accept it, which is a lot harder than I thought.'
description: The Pretty Little Liars actress, 29, set pulses racing as she shared a series of sultry snaps wearing a dark red bra and matching bottoms.
